name: The Watchful Eye
description:
This is a very unfinished game jam project I and brianfitzgerald put together in Spring of 2016.

One player using an oculus rift dk2 plays as the Watcher their goal is to kill all Runners trying to make it to their goal using their death ray.

Everyone else not in VR plays as the Runners and their goal is to avoid the gaze of the Watcher while trying to make it to the goal.
